## Utils.ValidationHelpers.isWellFormed property

Determines is a supplied tag is well-formed according to the lexical rules defined for the tag validated by these helpers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly isWellFormed: Validation.TypeGuardWithContext<T, TC>;
```
